messages.subject: I dunno.......
messages.msgSnippet: I have added some photo s to my album and I am not sure of what to describe them as. Would you be so kind as to offer your opinion as to what the figures are?
messages.messageBody:
I have added some photo's to my album and I am not sure of what to
describe them as. Would you be so kind as to offer your opinion as to
what the figures are?

I can't figure out what I am looking at............
It appears to be a Daruma, Sennin or a face on both the Fuchi/Kashira
of the one tanto. What do you think?

Number 2 has me stumped...... I don't recognize it at all. Somebody
help me..........

Thanks,
Elliott
